attributes.action: Cyclists must wear a crash helmet
attributes.additional_details: To reduce the burden on the NHS in dealing with head injuries
attributes.background: Make it law that cyclists must wear a crash helmet

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Haydn's Law – All children 16 and under to wear a helmet when riding a bicycle: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300165

Make it a legal requirement for ALL cyclists to wear a helmet: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315987
